item.title: Aquaplus announces Jasmine visual novel revival
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/aquaplus-announces-jasmine-visual-novel-revival

Aquaplus has announced the revival of Jasmine, a visual novel first announced in 2011 before being canceled in 2015. Platforms and a release date were not announced.

The game’s staff includes:

  • Script: Yuuichi Suzumoto
  • Character Design: Hisashi Kawata

Here is the first visual, which is the same visual released at the time of the game’s original announcement in 2011:

Further information was not announced.

item.title: Utawarerumono: Shiro e no Michishirube announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/utawarerumono-shiro-e-no-michishirube-announced

Latest entry in Aquaplus' flagship series due out in 2025 in Japan.

Aquaplus has announced Utawarerumono: Shiro e no Michishirube, the latest entry in its flagship Utawarerumono series. It will launch for unannounced platforms in 2025 in Japan.

The game’s staff includes:

  • Original Draft and Script: Suga Munemitsu
  • Character Design: mi
  • Original Character Design: Tatsuki Amazuyu / Misato Mitsumi
  • Music Director: Naoya Shimokawa
  • Opening Theme Song: “Tsuki no Fune Miagete”
    • Lyrics: Naoko Sutani
    • Composition and Arrangement: Junya Matsuoka
    • Vocals: Suara

The opening animation for Utawarerumono: Shiro e no Michishirube was shown at the “Great Aquaplus Festival: 30th Anniversary” event in Yokohama, Japan where the game was announced, but Aquaplus has yet to release the footage online.

Further information was not announced.

View the first images at the gallery.
